decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive plays to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It includes a variety of removal spells to deal with opposing threats, as well as creatures with powerful abilities to pressure the opponent. The deck has a mix of creatures with different abilities to provide versatility in how to approach each matchup. Additionally, the mana base is designed to support the aggressive nature of the deck and ensure consistent playability of spells. Overall, this deck aims to win the game quickly through a combination of efficient creatures and removal spells.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and swarm the board with powerful creatures. The deck focuses on utilizing cards like Destroy Evil and Audacity to clear the way for Skrelv's Hive and Venerated Rotpriest to deal damage quickly. Jawbone Duelist and Crawling Chorus provide additional support, while Skrelv, Defector Mite and Slaughter Singer offer strong attacking options. Bloated Contaminator serves as a late-game threat. The mana base is optimized with lands like Overgrown Farmland and Brushland to ensure consistent access to all colors needed for the deck.
